scripts.auditDeps: cd client && npm audit --production && cd ../server && npm audit --production
scripts.startFresh: docker compose down -v && docker compose up build
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.testAll: cd client && npm test -- --watchAll=false && cd ../server && npm test -- --watchAll=false --forceExit
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
